text: This is a list of rivers of Turkmenistan. They are arranged by where the river flows. == Caspian Sea == * Atrek River ** Sumbar (Sari-su) * Uzboy (extinct) - a former distributary of the Amu Darya == Karakum Desert == *Tejen River (Harirud) *Morghab River - now flows into the Qaraqum Canal **Kushk River **Kashkan River ==Aral Sea basin== * Amu Darya Turkmenistan Turkmenistan Category:Geography of Turkmenistan
title: List of rivers of Turkmenistan
